issue.title: This isn’t a bug it’s more of a question of an issue
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for iOS

### AdGuard version

4.4.5

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

flowers

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
I’m trying to figure this out and I still don’t get it maybe I’m just not smart enough to ever get this but if someone could help me I would appreciate 
2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>
![8730D42F-14E6-4A20-BC6B-29C60FF744B1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/118444664/214453090-37178966-6308-44af-9f75-c9b259af203e.png)
![09BFB119-E178-4A8B-A2EA-F14106372F02](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/118444664/214453119-103b2c51-035f-48af-bba5-37b552d4b1e3.png)

![E6C409BE-E7BF-4EAD-978F-6443E79E306A](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/118444664/214453216-ece62463-f444-4bc1-9de3-a3bd3679957d.jpeg)


So I hid the element of the flower with my adguard app but it also hid the dog element of exactly where the flower element was grid on Google search 

I’m guessing that’s because there’s not a class= 

so only the flower element is hid but nothing else of a different search of where the flower was is also hid?

I don’t get this can someone please help me I don’t know how to find a YouTube video specifically on this or what but I need someone help please!!!


<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

issue.title: Dead domains that can be removed from list
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

DNS doesn't have version

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

DNS

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard DNS filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
Hello

I have checked some parts of Adguard DNS list by Godaddy.com and found that 615 domains have no owner and can be bought. This means that the previous owner of the domains did not renew them. So these domains can be removed from list to make this list lighter (Adguard DNS and any other adguard list).
Lists of dead domains that I found can be downloaded in below:
[adguard dead domains.txt](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/files/10494698/adguard.dead.domains.txt)
you can check them yourself on https://www.godaddy.com/domains/bulk-domain-search
If you want, I can check all of the list.

2. Screenshots

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/56675802/214440583-8c921d48-2180-4508-84ce-be53f70665a9.png)



### Privacy

comment.body:
Hi. DNS filter is compiled from few sources, including third-party, but dead domains in general is not a big problem for this filter. Later we will clean filters from such domains.
In some cases "dead" domains cannot be removed from AG filters, as the domains are `still` available (for example, sites which change domain every few days).

comment.body:
Hi! Actually, you can do this using one rule with Regex if that `span` contains such text.
```
evrimagaci.org#?##feed-contents > div.cbox > div.infotop span.left:contains(/Evrim Ağacı'na Destek Ol|Discord|Evrim Ağacı'ndan Mesa|Sizden Gelenler/):upward(div.cbox)
```
or

```
evrimagaci.org#?##feed-contents > div.cbox > div.infotop span.left:contains(/Evrim Ağacı'|Discord|Sizden Gelenler/):upward(div.cbox)
```

comment.body:
I have tried the above rules one by one, with modules both disabled and enabled. Regardless of the other modules status, the following two rules indeed fix the issue:

- `@@||facebook.com^$jsinject`
- `@@||facebook.com^$jsinject,extension`

`! TODO: remove when `trusted-click-element` will be available in all AdGuard release verions`

issue.body: ### Prerequisites - [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [X] Browser version is up-to-date; - [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? Other ad blocker ### AdGuard version 2.1.46.59 ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? Chrome ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://d3ward.github.io/ ### What filters do you have enabled? AdGuard Annoyances filter ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots I've recently received hundreds of reports from users saying that some of my projects (public and private) no longer work as expected. I found out that Adguard updated the annoyances list with a very strange approach related to one of my projects, the adblock test. Here is the commit of the change: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/137b1d9410091d0a675b077d02505ab20a7c0b06 Basically my very simple adblock test https://d3ward.github.io/toolz/adblock.html does a check on the most popular hosts of a couple of categories, this projects works and has helped a lot of users, it works as expected with different DNS solutions, adblock extensions and more. Unfortunately not with Adguard products, though the lists works In the past I had a discussion with someone from Adguard team and we agreed that Adguard solutions are different, and somehow the adblock test have false positive because of how Adguard products works, which does not mean that Adguard does not work! When I use the Adguard lists annoyances with solutions like uBlock Origin, the test adblock works as expected and is not "useless test". 1. I don't see why it was necessary to add a statement like "! useless adblocker test with wrong tests", it feels disrespectful. In fact, I recommend using Adguard in a separate section of the adblock test. 2. Many users have reported that their Adguard product works even though the tool gives wrong results. So it's just a test. In fact, on a screenshot shared there, it shows how the test fails and Adguard works as expected. https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/138613#issuecomment-1366943050 3. The adblock tool even has a statement saying that some users may have problems, and there is actually a message every time the user does the test "it is a tool to use as a reference to see how efficient your blocking system is (note that with some DNS and browsers there may be problems)". I didn't want to be the one to point out which adblockers or DNS have problems (like the Adguard extension), so instead I opened discussion with the users and explained to them how things works. As far i know , while solutions like uBlock Origin actually block the connections , with Adguard products the requests are empty and this make the test fail . 4. A rule like `$third-party,domain=d3ward.github.io,important` it's kind of too much, it's block every external api call that start from the domain "d3ward.github.io" , in practice, my main domain is now considered even more annoying than any other ad provider, tracker or otherwise. The rule it's blocking even a simple Github API call I use on my portfolio -> I would like to see this resolved and perhaps open a discussion on what solution we can work on. I'm happy to provide any information, how the adblock test works, which rule should be used instead, etc. I'm aware that users are using the adblock test and thinking that Adguard is not working, and this is causing some confusion. I'm actually working on updating the test to be more clear and specific for only a set of adblocker solutions ### Privacy - [X] I agree to follow this condition

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://vk.com/im](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fvk.com%2Fim) ### Comment > Проблема заключается в том, что фильтр не распознает сайт vk.com в исключениях. При установленном VK Styles сайт был внесён в исключения для отображения анимированных обоев, но с сегодняшнего дня исключение не воспринимается сайтом как действительное, при установленном vk.com в исключениях VK не воспринимается как исключение и сайт указывает что, что ADGuard на нём продолжает работу, в связи с чем отображение рекламы и фон не работают. ### Screenshots

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://vk.com/im](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fvk.com%2Fim) ### Comment > Проблема заключается в том, что фильтр не распознает сайт vk.com в исключениях. При установленном VK Styles сайт был внесён в исключения для отображения анимированных обоев, но с сегодняшнего дня исключение не воспринимается сайтом как действительное, при установленном vk.com в исключениях VK не воспринимается как исключение и сайт указывает что, что ADGuard на нём продолжает работу, в связи с чем отображение рекламы и фон не работают. ### Screenshots

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

ublock

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.dealabs.com/discussions/carte-google-play-turquie-2498226

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

go to https://www.dealabs.com/discussions/carte-google-play-turquie-2498226, button "le plus utile d'abord" is blocked. Kt should open a dropdown list.

![image png-mh](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/111613844/214431752-dedf2f21-20e0-4f7f-afb5-6ed3757198bb.png)

seams to be caused by https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/AnnoyancesFilter/Cookies/sections/cookies_specific.txt#L490

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: vk.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://vk.com/im](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fvk.com%2Fim) ### Comment > Проблема заключается в том, что фильтр не распознает сайт vk.com в исключениях. При установленном VK Styles сайт был внесён в исключения для отображения анимированных обоев, но с сегодняшнего дня исключение не воспринимается сайтом как действительное, при установленном vk.com в исключениях VK не воспринимается как исключение и сайт указывает что, что ADGuard на нём продолжает работу, в связи с чем отображение рекламы и фон не работают. ### Screenshots

issue.title: www.bestbuy.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.bestbuy.com/identity/signin?token=tid%3Ad856b1c6-9ce4-11ed-8944-0ed60d688739](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bestbuy.com%2Fidentity%2Fsignin%3Ftoken%3Dtid%253Ad856b1c6-9ce4-11ed-8944-0ed60d688739) ### Comment Username: @ghwiz313 > Best Buy appears to be blocking login access with Adguard Public DNS enabled. I was able to isolate this issue to being DNS related because even with Adgaurd Content Blocking being disabled in Safari, I still encountered the error message in the provided screenshots. The error message no longer appeared once I connected to a network without Adguard DNS. ### Screenshots

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

3.6.54

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers, Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://news.sky.com/story/teams-and-outlook-goes-down-for-thousands-of-microsoft-users-12794856

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List, Legitimate URL Shortener

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_
